K10sf18_sc:4: \\\++ādhyātmikam āyatanaṁ tac ca bhagavatā uddiṣṭam avibhaktaṁ \\\
K10sf18_sc:10: \\\++ sapratighaṁ ucyate bhadaṁta dharmā bāhyam āyatanam ++\\\
K10sf18_sc:11: \\\sarvaṁ ca sarvam astīti sarvadharmāmś ca pṛcchati brahmaṇo bhikṣu \\\
K10sf18_sc:12: \\\+ / ṣaḍ bāhyāny āyatanāni katamāni ṣaṭ rūpaṁ bāhyam. ++\\\
K10sf18_sc:15: eno89_3 \\\ dharmāṁś ca pṛcchati brāhmaṇo bhikṣur ānandaḥ śāstā bhikṣu u +++
K10sf18_sc:16: \\\? ṭ cakṣur ādhyātmikam āyatanaṁ śrotraṁ ghrānaṁ jihvā kāyo +\\\
K10sf18_sc:17: \\\? bdo rasaḥ spraṣṭavyo dharmo bāhyam āyatanam // ṣaḍ vijñāṇa \\\
K10sf18_sc:19: \\\ saṁsparśajā vedanā // ṣaḍ ime saṁjñākāyāḥ katame ṣaṭ cakṣu +\\\
K10sf18_sc:22: \\\? ṣṭavyāvekṣaḥ dharmāvekṣa // ṣaḍ imāni cetakhilaṁ mṛkṣa + \\\
K10sf18_sc:23: \\\? dharmāḥ sāsravāḥ sopādānīyāḥ cetaḥkhilaṁ mrakṣa vastu\\\
K10sf18_sc:24: \\\? stunā // cakṣur bhikṣavaḥ anityam atītam anāgataṁ kaḥ \\\
K10sf18_sc:25: \\\ nandati pratyupannasya cakṣuṣo nirvide virāgāya nirodhāya\\\
